column4: Simple question - how do I install a *.deb file with apt-get?  I'm so used to using repositories I never remember how to install a file.  I know I can use dpkg -i, but that doesn't do dependency checking before installing.
double click your deb file and it should open up with archive manager
not sure but It works well enough for me... I believe they probably do... I mean they sell VMWorkstation and VMPlayer and VMServer is free
Do you know the package name?  I'm doing it from the command line.  (Remotely logged in)
